section.title: Track Cumulative IO
section.para: This section describes how to track the cumulative amount of I/O to the system.
section.remark: what do $return, $length, and $count return, specifically? when i substituted $return for $length here, script still ran but gave me bigger numbers. errored out with $length. where documented?
section.para: is similar to (from ); both SystemTap scripts print out the top ten executables generating I/O traffic over time. However, tracks the cumulative amount of I/O reads and writes done by the system's top ten executables. This information is tracked and printed out in 1-second intervals and in descending order.
